description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he focuses on transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa's work spans various topics including ecosystem architecture, decentralization, and innovation. His blog posts and courses explore concepts like digital fragmentation, regenerative design, and sustainable collaboration. yeehaa's approach combines philosophical insights with practical applications in technology and society, aiming to foster thriving, interconnected communities and systems.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends philosophy and tech to transform education and knowledge sharing. His work explores ecosystem architecture, decentralization, and innovation, aiming to create impactful, inclusive digital environments and foster thriving communities.
